{{Discrimination sidebar}} {{Multiple issues| {{Unsourced|date=September 2022}} {{Original research|date=September 2022}} }} The term "'''racism against Asians'''" or "'''anti-Asian racism'''" is typically meant to include [[racist]] policies, discrimination, and mistreatment of [[Asian people]] and Asian immigrants by institutions or non-Asian people, particularly in the [[Western world]].
== Concept == The concept of 'racism against Asians' is most common in communities or countries where the ethnic or racial majority is non-Asian, or the national character is [[Western world|Western]]. The concept is most often employed referring to Anti-Asian phenomena in countries of North America, South America and Europe.
